alert.note: Alert for Desha; Drew; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 3:13PM CDT until June 08 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Desha County in southeastern Arkansas... Northern Drew County in southeastern Arkansas... Southwestern Lincoln County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 312 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Plantersville, or 10 miles south of Star City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dumas... Rohwer... Mitchellville... Tillar... Watson... Winchester... Omega... Plantersville... Lucca Landing... Kelso... Reed... Garrett Bridge... Gourd... Florence... Tyro... Rose Hill... Selma... Yukon... Montongo... Relfs Bluff... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
